title: Ayurvedic and Naturopathic Medical Clinic Bellevue
description: At Cancer Doctor Finder, we help patients find the right Alternative and Integrative Treatment Center for their journey. Ayurvedic and Naturopathic Medical Clinic can be the center you are looking for! Cancer Doctor Finder
cleaned_text: Washington, 98004, United States [Get Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/47.62939139207084,-122.19233715792228) Providers at Ayurvedic and Naturopathic Medical Clinic About Ayurvedic and Naturopathic Medical Clinic From Ayurvedic and Naturopathic Medical Clinic's website: At the Ayurvedic & Naturopathic Medical Clinic, we embrace a philosophy of holistic wellness that encourages an individual's inherent power to self-heal. Blending the art of ancient health practices with modern science, our treatments are designed to rebalance the body, revitalize the mind and center the spirit. Established in 1989 by Dr Virender Sodhi, the first licensed Ayurvedic and Naturopathic physician in the United States, our team of doctors and aestheticians offer a dynamic range of services that are completely customized to suit your core energy profile.
